name: Restaurants
description: All the restaurants I've eaten at, including dine-in, take-out, and delivery.

rankSlots.title: Fantastic: First Choice
rankSlots.description: Great food and/or visited multiple times

rankSlots.title: Fine

items.name: 375 Chicken & Fries
items.comments: Parmesan Truffle Fries are my weakness, and the other food is really good. Chicken sandwiches are fine.

items.name: Unidentified Flying Chickens - UFC
items.comments: Really great value, great KFC and sandwiches.
